title: Chapter 1841 - Luo Tiandu
body:
Chapter 1841 - Luo Tiandu

Three to five years might seem a little tight, but it’s… enough, Su Yi thought to himself.

He was currently in the mid-stage Miracle Realm. If he wholeheartedly focused on his cultivation and breaking through, three to five years was enough to reach the Great Profound Stage.

If he wanted, he could reach the peak of the Great Profound Stage whenever he pleased, but… Su Yi wouldn’t do any such thing.

After fusing with the imprints of several of his past lives, Su Yi had never been focused on how quickly he broke through. Rather, he’d always focused on surpassing his past selves at every step of the way.

In other words, he sought stable foundations and steady progress!

Advancing from the mid-stage Miracle Realm to the peak of the Great Profound Stage and maintaining stable foundations at every step of the way seemed almost impossible in so little time.

But it wasn’t impossible for Su Yi.

After all, he’d gone from an Immortal Lord to an Immortal King in just a month, and moreover, he was already in the middle stage of the Miracle Realm!

Next, I’ll go explore some of the Eastern Sea’s forbidden zones, thought Su Yi.

If he wanted...
